name: IT201 Sprint 3 Shivam Desai
description:
A game to draw with a vast degree of options and features! Change colors and sizes and draw the image of your dreams!

Directions:

Left Click to draw

Right Click to erase

Use sliders to change effect duration, colors, size,  opacity,  and glow

Use the dropdown to change shapes

Use the checkbox to enable destruction of objects, this enables the slider which allows you to change the time it takes to destroy an object

New features:

1. Added "animation duration" slider to change the duration of seen effects

2. Added prefabs of different shapes

3. Added animations on drawn images
